channel.title: Posts on A Lifelong Learner
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Lifelong Learner

item.title: Github SSH Key
item.description: Open SSH will Soon be Depreciated GitHub is depreciating its use of Open SSH to authenticate users when pushing changes to GitHub.

item.title: A Primer for a Computer Science Student
item.description: Introduction As I reflect on my current state as a Computer Science major with three semesters left before I finish my Undergraduate program, I realize that not being aware of certain resources to support me and taking advantage of a few resources sooner, put me behind in pursuing Software Development.

item.title: Why Calculus was hard for me
item.description: As a Computer Science major, I had to take two* semesters of Calculus.

item.title: My Experience with GSU Digital Learners to Leaders
item.description: An Overview of Digital Learners to Leaders In 2019, I participated in a program at my school called Digital Learners to Leaders.
